assetRequirements.purpose: to capture the essence of autumn in Antalya with warm beaches and vibrant sunsets
assetRequirements.visual_style: bright and colorful, emphasizing natural beauty and relaxation
assetRequirements.content_context: showcasing the warm sand, vibrant sunsets, and fresh cuisine available in Antalya during autumn

assetRequirements.purpose: to highlight Antalya as a travel destination with its beaches and culinary experiences
assetRequirements.visual_style: dynamic and engaging, focusing on local culture and gastronomy
assetRequirements.content_context: featuring fresh seafood, Turkish bazaars, and aromatic spices

usageInstructions.placement: Place according to campaign layout requirements
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Откройте для себя Турцию осенью — мечты сбываются!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected hero". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
